message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is already a significant discount on my end.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $15,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
